name: Procyon Web Assistant
description: Procyon Web Assistant is a Chrome extension that adds LLM capabilities to your browser's side panel. This chat-style interface allows you to interact with webpage content using local-hosted or API-accessed popular language models. Visit the github page https://github.com/aeromechanic000/procyon-web-assistant and youtube channel @aeromechanic_vlog for more information, and welcome join in my discord server https://discord.gg/PJv8TrBYVJ to have a direct communication.
